name: Beat Survival
description:
Beat Survival is survival 2d pixel graphics open world game where a single player or 2 players local co-op can do crafting, beat and shoot some zombies, enemies and wild animals up. Every creature that been killed will turn into zombies. It's almost a real simulation when you tried to survive in zombie epidemic situation. You loot, scavenge, craft as well as dismantle, make traps and explosive bomb, trade with NPC, and do some missions to get skill points and rewards.

Use any of PS4 DualShock, Xbox controller, Generic game controller or just with PC Keyboard and mouse on a single player by pressing "S" when you're ready.
On Multiplayer local co-op, both players can use controllers or a player with controller and other player with PC keyboard and mouse by pressing "S" when you're ready.

You can play alone or with any friend and family on 2 players local co-op with more fun and challenging interactions try to survive, add more skill by accomplish missions in different locations and weather / day and night and times. Those skills you can add such as carpentry, electrician, swimming, driving, healing others, command others, stealing, cooking, crafting, repairing / fixing, throwing boomerang, fishing, and crafting would be available depend on what level you choose.

Surviving as long as you can try with Easy level first when you automatically equipped with those skills and allowed to revive view times combating those zombies, NPC and wild animals, or you can jump into Hard level which you only live once fighting with stronger enemies.

Beat Survival Features:
- Survive in winter, spring, summer and autumn season. You deal with Rain, dry, hot and cold weather in bright and dark conditions.
- Loot / scavenge or creating more than 200 items and weapons.
- More than 100 different kind of zombie, NPC, and Animal designs.
- Elevator system! Yeah, this game is more unique because you can use elevator for higher building such hospital and apartment. Beware enemies and zombies can follow you if they accidently go inside. They can also use stairs.
- Player can board up door and window and dismantle it. You can jump from window on higher building, but it might hurt and kill you depend on the floor.
- More than 20 different type of vehicle. Try to find the vehicle key and driving skill first. Buy vehicle is also a good option.
- More than 15 missions that you can get from interact with NPC in Early Access. Over 70 missions will be ready for Full version.
- Shoot them up with different type of firearms or burn them up with crafted molotov or you can set some trap for your enemies.
- Melee weapon also available such as knife, baseball bat, spiky baseball bat, boomerang, machete, chainsaw, hammer, shovel, scissor, axe, bow, spear etc.
- On 2 players local co-op, you can split or one screen depending on what you like by simple pressing the split/one screen button.
- Electric and water that can be set to never, always, 5 days, 10 days and 30 days that can not be consumed depend on setting you choose.
- Fog of war set up that will show the location visible where you've been on map or you can turn it off to show the whole map.
- Player Vision enable that will show any objects including enemy / NPC where player is facing.
- Other player's condition display besides Life such as Hunger, Thirst, Hygiene, Stamina, Stress, Health, Wound, Infection, and Body Temperature.
- Throwing body, garbage bin, chairs, table like you experience in any beat up game.
